overview: A tough as nails hero cop (Elliot Lightning Scott, Canadian Karate & Kickboxing Champ) gets transferred to a new district, partnered with a by the book Preacher cop (Yoon Park, Korean Tae-Kwon-Do Champ). Who foil the plot of an international smuggling ring. Some of the most intense stunts on Canadian film.

production_companies.name: Bad Acting Good Kung Fu Canada

title: Stalker and the Hero
